content: hooded and collared options the hood requires seaming the collared version is seamless sleeves are worked in the round hood and body are worked flat traduction française par nananne 1 sur le blog de nananne 2 the french translation was not done by the designer this is an easy neck down almost seamless design with no buttonholes just ties to close it it does have one seam at the top of the hood and directions are given for a collar instead of the hood the cardigan was designed to go with the pattern # 262 baby bottoms /patterns/library/-262-baby-bottoms
